attributes.action: Stamp out vehicle registration fraud by implementing a system of identity checks whenever a vehicle is bought & sold.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a serious problem with unrecorded vehicles and falsely registered keepers that is undermining public trust in the DVLA and the effectiveness of vehicle registration in general. 

Sending off little slips of paper just doesn't provide adequate safeguards.

Please implement a continuous vehicle ownership scheme that requires each change of ownership to validate the identity of the participants. Licenced motor traders should be required to validate and record two forms of identity of purchasers (which the already do when providing credit). Private persons should be required to transact sales at the Post Office where both parties provide two forms of identity.
